definition: all day long/the whole day/the whole time
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: How dirty can one woman get in her own bed?
sentences.chinese: 一个成日待在床上的女人能由多脏？

sentences.english: Tired of the President's beady eyes starting at you all day in your government office?
sentences.chinese: 总统肖像成日目光如豆影响办公室士气怎办？

sentences.english: You must be very tired after working all day.
sentences.chinese: 你做咗成日嘢，一定好𤶊嘞。

sentences.english: I haven't had sex for almost a year. Two days ago, I made love with my bf.
sentences.chinese: 太耐无做就一定会痛，甚至有几天会成日想去小便。

definition: to squint/what? (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
to not have (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 沒有|没有[mei2 you3]
so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
to play tricks on or toy with/delicate/exquisite (Cantonese)
to shy away from work/to get by without attending duty
